verses.text: FEKUKI, ‘Eiki, mo kinautolu ‘oku fekuki mo au: Tau‘i ‘a kinautolu ‘oku tau‘i au.
To‘o ‘a e pā mo e fakaū, Pea ke tu‘u ke tokoni au.
Unuhi ‘a e tao, ‘o songo ‘a e hala kiate kinautolu ‘oku tuli kita: Lea ki hoku laumālie, “Ko au ho mo‘ui‘anga.”
‘Ofa ke mā mo laea ‘a kinautolu ‘oku tuli ki he‘eku mo‘ui: Pea ko kinautolu ‘oku feinga kovi kiate au, ‘Ofa ke fakafoki ki mui kinautolu, ‘o fakapuputu‘u‘i.
Ke nau hangē ko e kafukafu ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e matangi, Pea fakateka ‘e he ‘āngelo ‘a e ‘Eiki.
Ke fakapo‘uli mo heheke ‘aupito honau hala, Pea tuli kinautolu ‘e he ‘āngelo ‘a Sihova.
He kuo nau fakamohe kupenga kiate au ta‘ehano ‘uhinga, Ta‘ehano ‘uhinga ‘enau keli luo ke ma‘u kita.
Ke mo‘utāmakia ia ‘e he faka‘auha; Pea ko e kupenga kuo ne fakamohe, ‘ofa ke tau ai ia: ‘Io, ‘ofa ke ne tō ‘i he faka‘auha pē ko ia.
Toki hākahaka hoku laumālie ‘i he ‘Eiki: ‘O tome‘e ‘i he‘ene fakamo‘ui.
Ko hoku hui kotoa ‘e lea, “‘Eiki, ko hai ‘oku tatau mo e ‘Afiona, Ho‘o huhu‘i ‘a e tōkilalo meiate ia ‘oku mālohi ange, ‘Io, ‘a e tōkilalo mo e masiva meiate ia ‘oku fai hono vete?”
‘Oku tu‘u hake ‘ani fakamo‘oni fakamālohi; ‘Oku nau ‘eke mai ‘a e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku ‘ikai te u ‘ilo‘i.
‘Oku nau totongi ‘eku lelei ‘aki ‘a e kovi pē, ‘Oku hangē ha toenga mate hoku laumālie.
Ka ko au–na‘a ku ‘ai tauanga‘a ‘i he‘enau mahaki‘ia: Na‘a ku fakavaivai‘i hoku laumālie ‘aki ‘a e fiekaia; Pea ko ‘eku lotu–a! ke foki mai ā kia kita!
Na‘a ku fai ‘o hangē ko ha kaume‘a pe tokoua mo‘oni: Hangē ha taha ‘oku tēngihia ‘ene fa‘ē na‘e pehē ‘eku mapelu ‘o tangi.
Ka ‘i he‘eku humu ‘aku na‘a nau fiefia, ‘o fakataha leva: Na‘a nau fakataha ke ngaohia kita, ‘O nau tā mai ta‘e te u ‘iloa; Na‘a nau hae au ‘o ‘ikai tuku ā:
Na‘a nau fingofingo mai ‘i he lotolotonga ‘o e kau ta‘elotu, Na‘a nau ‘ūtaki kaunifo kiate au.
‘E ‘Ātonai, ko futu ho‘o mo‘usioa pē! Fakafoki mu‘a mei he‘enau koto faka‘auha na ‘a hoku laumālie, ‘A‘eku me‘a pē taha mei he fanga laione.
Ka u fakafeta‘i atu ‘i he fakataha lahi: Te u fakamālō ki he ‘Afiona ‘i he lotolotonga ‘o ha fu‘u kakai.
Ko kinautolu ‘oku fakafili mai koe‘uhi ko ha loi, Ke ‘oua te nau fakama‘ito‘a: Pea ko kinautolu ‘oku fehi‘a mai tu‘unga‘a pē, Ke ‘oua te nau fakahilehila.
He tala‘ehai ko e melino ‘oku nau lea‘aki: Ka ‘oku nau fakakaukau lea kākā, Ke kovi ‘a e kakai ‘oku nofo nonga ‘i he fonua.
‘Io, na‘a nau fakamanga honau ngutu kia kita; Na‘a nau pehē, Mālie, mālie, ‘a e sio ki ai hotau mata.
Kuo ke sio mo koe, ‘Eiki; ‘oua te ke fakalongo: ‘Ātonai ē, ‘oua te ke nofo mama‘o.
O‘io‘i, pea ke ‘ā ke fakamāu‘i kita; ‘E hoku ‘Otua mo hoku ‘Eiki, ‘ā ke tokanga‘i ‘eku me‘a.
Fakamaau au ‘o taau mo ho‘o faitotonu, ‘e Sihova ko hoku ‘Otua; ‘O ‘oua ‘e luki kiate au ‘a kinautolu na.
Ke ‘oua te nau pehē ‘i honau loto, Mālie, ko hotau loto ia: Ke ‘oua te nau pehē, Kuo tau folo ia.
Ke mā mo puputu‘u ‘a kinautolu ‘oku fiefia ‘i he‘eku ‘i he kovi; Ke nau ‘ai ‘a e mā mo e laea ‘a kinautolu ‘oku mata hihiki.
Ke tuē mo mavava ‘a kinautolu ‘oku tangane‘ia ‘i he‘eku faitotonu; ‘Io, ke nau lau ma‘u pē, Mālō mo e ‘Eiki, ‘Ene loto‘aki ‘a e tu‘umālie ‘o ‘ene sevāniti.
Pea ko ho‘o mā‘oni‘oni ‘e ‘a‘au ‘e hoku ‘elelo, Mo ho fakamālō ‘i he kotoa ‘o e ‘aho.
